channel.title: Good Film Hunting
channel.itunes:keywords: movie, film, summer, college, funny, boston, review, culture

channel.description: Movie reviews from some Boston college students

item.title: 001 - Aladdin and Longshot
item.description: Today we explore the two big movies of the week, Aladdin and Longshot. We also look ahead to what else we are excited to see this summer.
item.itunes:summary: Today we explore the two big movies of the week, Aladdin and Longshot. We also look ahead to what else we are excited to see this summer.
